column5: Thank you for taking the time to read my post and create a thoughtful response. I really appreciate it.

I had a similar experience with Tumblr back when they allowed porn on their platform. I would dedicate one day a month to go down the rabbit hole and report as many things as I could handle to the FBI without truly getting to the heart of anything as I really couldn't bear to get that close to something so horrifying. 

I'd need the rest of the month to recoup and sometimes I'd skip a month because I was just not fucking ok. It all became worth it once Tumblr finally got ripped apart by the federal government for not having a more strict system in place to try and curb these types of posts. 

Tumblr was a dumpster fire for this kind of thing and now their platform is basically dead but they fucking deserve it for not doing more to keep child porn and bestiality off of their platform.
Thank you I appreciate your input
